question_text: A cereal box is a cuboid. You measure its height and width. What other measurement do you need for its volume?
A garden path is a long rectangle. What two measurements are needed to find its area?
A box has a length of 20cm and a width of 10cm. Can you find its volume with only this information?
You know a room is 5m long and has an area of 20 m². Can you use a formula to find its width?
A rectangular swimming pool has a length of 25m and a width of 10m. What calculation gives its surface area?
A roll of turf is a long rectangle. What two measurements must the seller provide for you to know its area?
An analogue clock shows 3 o'clock. How would you write this on a 12-hour digital clock?
A digital clock shows 5:00. What time is this in words?
An analogue clock shows half past 7. How is this written on a 12-hour digital clock?
A digital clock shows 9:30. What is this time in words?
An analogue clock shows quarter past 4. How would you write this digitally?
A digital clock reads 2:15. What is this time in words?
An analogue clock shows quarter to 6. How is this written on a digital clock?
A digital clock reads 8:45. How would you say this time using the word to?
The time is 10 past 2. How is this written on a digital clock?
A digital clock says 11:10. How would you say this time?
The time is 20 past 1. What would a digital clock show?
What is 6:20 in words?
An analogue clock shows 25 to 7. What time is this digitally?
A digital clock says 12:50. How would you say this using the word to?
What time is 5 past midnight on a 12-hour digital clock?
A digital clock shows 1:00. What is this time on an analogue clock?
An analogue clock shows 10:30. What is this time known as?
How is quarter past 12 written on a digital clock?
What is another way to say 3:45?
The time is 5 to 8. How would a digital clock show this?
What is 4:40 in words, using to?
An analogue clock shows 10 o'clock. Write this time digitally.
A digital clock shows 6:30. How do we say this time?
It is quarter to 11. What time is this on a digital clock?
It is 25 past 1. How is this written digitally?
What is 3:00 pm in 24-hour clock time?
A digital clock shows 17:00. What is this in 12-hour am/pm time?
Convert 8:00 am to 24-hour time.
What is 21:00 in 12-hour clock time?
A train leaves at 4:30 pm. How would this be shown on a 24-hour timetable?
A TV show starts at 19:30. What time is this in the 12-hour am/pm format?
Write 11:00 pm in 24-hour format.
What is 06:00 in 12-hour am/pm time?
Your friend says they will meet you at 14:00. What time is this in the afternoon?
An analogue clock shows 7 o'clock in the evening. How would you write this in 24-hour time?
What is 12:00 pm (noon) in 24-hour format?
What is 12:00 am (midnight) in 24-hour format?
A shop closes at 18:00. What time is this in the evening?
Write half past eight in the morning in 24-hour format.
What is 20:00 in 12-hour am/pm time?
A flight departs at 1:00 pm. How is this written in 24-hour format?
An analogue clock shows 10 o'clock at night. What is this in 24-hour time?
Convert 10:00 am to 24-hour time.
What is 01:00 in 12-hour format?
A film starts at 20:30. Is this in the morning or the evening?
Write quarter past six in the evening as a 24-hour time.
Convert 10:25 pm to 24-hour time.
What is 18:47 in 12-hour am/pm format?
An analogue clock shows 12 minutes past 8 in the morning. Write this in 24-hour format.
A digital clock reads 23:58. What is this in 12-hour time?
A train arrives at 14:02. What time is this in 12-hour format?
Write three minutes to four in the afternoon in 24-hour format.
An alarm goes off at 06:18. How would you write this using am/pm?
Convert 1:11 pm into 24-hour time.
What is 00:01 in 12-hour am/pm format?
An analogue clock shows 8 minutes to 11 at night. What time is this in the 24-hour format?
A show ends at 21:38. Write this in 12-hour time.
What is 12:05 pm (just after noon) in 24-hour format?
How would you write seven minutes past midnight in 24-hour format?
Convert the time 4:56 am to 24-hour format.
What is 13:01 in 12-hour format?
Write 9:13 pm in 24-hour time.
A digital clock says 16:22. Is this time in the morning or the afternoon?
What is nineteen minutes past one in the morning, in 24-hour format?
Convert 17:08 to 12-hour time.
A message was sent at 6:45 pm. How would the timestamp appear in 24-hour format?
A clock shows 00:45. What is this in 12-hour am/pm format?
Is 23:30 closer to midnight or noon?
Write 2:22 am in 24-hour format.
An analogue clock shows 1 minute to midnight. How is this written in 24-hour time?
What is 12:59 pm in 24-hour format?
A flight from London to New York takes 8 hours. If it departs at 10:30 (London time), and New York is 5 hours behind London, what is the arrival time in New York's local time (12-hour format)?
A TV show starts at 19:45 and lasts for 90 minutes. What time does it finish in 12-hour pm format?
You start a task at 11:20 am and work for 3 hours and 45 minutes. What time do you finish in 24-hour format?
A train is scheduled to depart at 14:10. It is delayed by 85 minutes. What is the new departure time in 12-hour pm format?
An event finished at 1:20 am. It lasted for 2 hours and 30 minutes. What was the start time in 24-hour format (from the previous day)?
A clock is 15 minutes fast. It shows 16:05. What is the true time in 12-hour pm format?
A clock is 25 minutes slow. It shows 8:50 am. What is the actual time in 24-hour format?
What is the time difference between 08:30 and 15:10?
A flight arrives in a city 6 hours ahead of its departure city. The flight time is 9 hours. If it leaves at 22:00, what is the local arrival time?
A meeting in Tokyo (9 hours ahead of London) is at 15:00 local time. What time is this in London (in 24-hour format)?
A film is 135 minutes long. If it finishes at 11:10 pm, what time did it start in 24-hour format?
A timer is set for 5,000 seconds. If it starts at 10:00:00, what time will it finish in 24-hour format?
A journey starts at 21:30 on Monday and ends at 04:15 on Tuesday. What is the total duration?
Convert 150 hours into days and hours.
What time is it in London (GMT) if it is 16:00 in Cairo (GMT+2)?
A satellite TV broadcast starts at 20:00 in London. What time should you watch it in New York (5 hours behind London)?
An event starts at 11:30 am and ends at 3:15 pm. How long is this in hours and minutes?
A watch gains 2 minutes every day. If it is set correctly at 08:00 on Monday, what time will it show at 08:00 on Wednesday?
A train journey is advertised as taking 190 minutes. If you depart at 16:40, what is the scheduled arrival time in 12-hour pm format?
A bus leaves a stop every 18 minutes. If one leaves at 13:50, what time does the next one leave?
It is 15:20 in Paris (1 hour ahead of London). A flight to London takes 1 hour. What time will you land in London (local time)?
Your lunch break is 45 minutes long. You take it at 12:50. What time must you be back at work?
A task finished at 01:05. It took 3 hours and 30 minutes. What was the start time in 24-hour format (from the previous day)?
A meeting is scheduled for 14:00 GMT. If you are in a time zone that is GMT-6, what time is the meeting for you?
What is the time difference between 22:15 on Friday and 08:45 on Sunday?
Which is a metric unit for length: an inch or a centimetre?
Which is an imperial unit for weight: a kilogram or a pound?
Which is a metric unit for capacity: a litre or a pint?
An inch is a unit of length. Is it a metric or an imperial unit?
A pound (lb) is a unit of weight. Is it a metric or an imperial unit?
A pint is a unit of capacity. Is it a metric or an imperial unit?
Which is longer: 1 inch or 1 centimetre?
Which is heavier: 1 kilogram or 1 pound?
Which holds more: 1 litre or 1 pint?
A ruler might show both centimetres and inches. Which unit has smaller markings?
When you buy milk, you can often choose between a carton measured in litres or a bottle measured in pints. Which is the metric unit?
You weigh yourself at the gym in kilograms. Is this a metric or imperial measurement?
A recipe from an old cookbook asks for 2 pounds of flour. Is pounds a metric or imperial unit?
Which is shorter: 1 metre or 1 yard? (Hint: A yard is 3 feet)
Which holds less: a 2-litre bottle of cola or a 4-pint bottle of milk?
Is your height more commonly measured in metres or feet in the UK?
The speed limit on UK roads is shown in miles per hour. Is miles a metric or imperial unit?
Which is a metric unit: a gallon or a litre?
Which is an imperial unit: a gram or an ounce?
Which is a shorter distance: 1 kilometre or 1 mile?
A TV screen size is measured in inches. Is this a metric or imperial unit?
A baby's weight is often given in pounds and ounces. Are these metric or imperial units?
A pub serves beer in pints. Is this a metric or imperial measure?
To measure a small object, would you get a more precise reading using centimetres or inches?
Which is a greater weight: 10 kilograms or 10 pounds?
An inch is approximately 2.5cm. How many centimetres are in 2 inches?
A kilogram is about 2.2 pounds. A baby weighs 3kg. What is its approximate weight in pounds?
A litre is about 1.76 pints. You buy a 2-litre bottle of juice. Approximately how many pints is this?
A ruler is 30cm long. Using the approximation 1 inch = 2.5cm, about how many inches long is the ruler?
A bag of sugar weighs 1kg. Approximately how many pounds (lbs) is this? (Use 1kg ≈ 2.2 lbs)
A road sign says a town is 10 miles away. If 1 mile is about 1.6km, how far is the town in kilometres?
A standard UK pint of milk is 568ml. Is this more or less than half a litre?
A person is 6 feet tall. If 1 foot is about 30cm, what is their approximate height in centimetres?
A recipe requires 1 pound of butter. You only have a 500g block. Is this enough? (Use 1kg ≈ 2.2 lbs)
A car's petrol tank holds 10 gallons. If 1 gallon is about 4.5 litres, what is the tank's capacity in litres?
A door is 2 metres high. Approximately how many feet is this? (Use 1 foot ≈ 30cm)
Which is heavier: a 5kg weight or a 10 pound weight? (Use 1kg ≈ 2.2 lbs)
Which is a longer distance: 3 miles or 5 kilometres? (Use 1 mile ≈ 1.6 km)
How many centimetres are in 4 inches? (Use 1 inch ≈ 2.5cm)
A baby weighs 8 pounds. What is this weight approximately in kilograms? (Use 1kg ≈ 2.2 lbs)
A 4-pint bottle of milk is how many litres, approximately? (Use 1 litre ≈ 1.76 pints)
A piece of wood is 50cm long. About how many inches is this? (Use 1 inch ≈ 2.5cm)
A boxer weighs 150 pounds. What is his approximate weight in kilograms? (Use 1kg ≈ 2.2 lbs)
A long journey is 100 miles. How far is this in kilometres? (Use 1 mile ≈ 1.6 km)
Which holds more: a 1-gallon container or a 4-litre container? (Use 1 gallon ≈ 4.5 litres)
A person is 150cm tall. Approximately how many feet is this? (Use 1 foot ≈ 30cm)
How many inches are in half a foot?
A car has a fuel efficiency of 40 miles per gallon. What is this in miles per litre? (Use 1 gallon ≈ 4.5 litres)
A room is 10 feet long. What is the length of the room in metres? (Use 1 foot ≈ 30.5cm)
A person weighs 11 stone. If 1 stone is 14 pounds, and 1kg is 2.2 pounds, what is their approximate weight in kg?
A price is listed as $50 per square foot. What is the approximate price per square metre? (1 metre ≈ 3.3 feet)
Convert a speed of 60 miles per hour into kilometres per hour. (1 mile ≈ 1.6 km)
Which is a faster speed: 100 km/h or 60 mph? (1 mile ≈ 1.6 km)
A US recipe asks for a cup of flour (approx 120g). A UK recipe asks for 4 ounces (oz). Which recipe needs more flour? (1 oz ≈ 28g)
A plank of wood is 2 metres long. Another is 6 feet 6 inches long. Which is longer? (1 foot = 12 inches, 1 inch ≈ 2.5cm)
A field has an area of 1 acre. Approximately how many square metres is this? (1 acre ≈ 4047 m²)
A car tank holds 12 gallons of petrol. If petrol costs £1.40 per litre, what is the cost to fill the tank? (1 gallon ≈ 4.5 litres)
A road speed limit is 50 mph. What is this speed in metres per second (m/s), approximately? (1 mile ≈ 1600m)
You have a 2-litre bottle of water. You drink 2 pints. How much is left in litres? (1 litre ≈ 1.76 pints)
A package weighs 4 pounds and 8 ounces. What is its weight in kilograms? (1 stone = 14 lbs, 1 kg ≈ 2.2 lbs)
Convert 1 square metre into square inches. (1 metre ≈ 39 inches)
A cyclist is travelling at 20 mph. How long will it take them to travel 50km? (1 mile ≈ 1.6km)
A box has a volume of 2 cubic feet. What is its approximate volume in litres? (1 foot ≈ 30cm)
Which is a larger volume: 1 cubic metre or 35 cubic feet?
A pressure is 15 pounds per square inch (PSI). What is this in kilograms per square centimetre? (1kg ≈ 2.2 lbs, 1 inch ≈ 2.54cm)
A weight is 15 pounds. A length is 10 inches. What calculation converts this to kg/cm?
A car travels 50km. How many miles is this? (1 mile ≈ 1.6km)
Your height is 5 feet 8 inches. What is your height in metres? (1 inch ≈ 2.54cm)
Which has a greater area: a circle with a 10-inch radius or a 1-foot square?
A temperature is 20° Celsius. The formula to convert to Fahrenheit is F = (C × 9/5) + 32. What is the temperature in Fahrenheit?
Which contains more liquid: a US gallon (3.79 litres) or 8 pints (UK)? (1 UK pint = 568ml)
A suitcase weighs 50 pounds. The airline limit is 23 kilograms. Is the suitcase over the limit? (1kg ≈ 2.2 lbs)
A movie is 2 hours long. How many minutes is its duration?
A song lasts 3 minutes. How many seconds is this?
Convert a 4-week school holiday into days.
An infant is 1 year old. What is their age in months?
Convert the duration of a 10-minute TV show into seconds.
Convert a 5-week trip duration into days.
Convert the age of 3 years into months.
Convert 4 hours into minutes.
Convert 5 minutes into seconds.
Convert a 6-week project deadline into days.
If a contract lasts 5 years, what is its duration in months?
Convert 1 hour into minutes.
Convert 120 seconds into minutes.
Convert a 14-day holiday into weeks.
If a baby is 24 months old, how many years old is she?
Convert 180 minutes into hours.
You have been working for 60 seconds. How many minutes is that?
Convert a 7-day rental agreement into weeks.
Convert 12 months into years.
Convert 5 hours into minutes.
Convert 10 minutes into seconds.
A commitment lasts for 10 weeks. How many days does this period cover?
Convert 10 years into months.
How many minutes are in a half-hour?
Convert a task that takes 21 days into weeks.
A film lasts 1 hour and 10 minutes. How many minutes is this?
A race took 85 seconds. How many minutes and seconds is this?
A holiday lasts for 23 days. How many weeks and days is this?
A child is 28 months old. How many years and months is this?
A bus journey is 2 hours and 5 minutes long. What is its total length in minutes?
You need to boil a potato for 4 minutes and 30 seconds. How many seconds is that?
A school term is 7 weeks and 5 days long. How many days is this in total?
A warranty is valid for 1.5 years. How many months is this?
A song lasts for 160 seconds. How many minutes and seconds is that?
A journey took 60 hours. How many full days and hours is this?
Convert 1 year and 11 months into just months.
A meeting was 110 minutes long. Write this in hours and minutes.
An event lasted for 36 hours. How many days and hours is this?
What is 3.5 years in months?
What is 4.5 minutes in seconds?
A task takes 170 minutes. How many hours and minutes is this?
A holiday is 26 days long. How many full weeks is that?
A baby is 19 months old. How many years and months is this?
A class is 1 hour and 25 minutes long. How many minutes is that?
A timer shows 100 seconds. How long is this in minutes and seconds?
A project lasts for 9 weeks and 1 day. How many days is this?
How many minutes are there in 1.75 hours?
A long bus trip is 40 hours. How many full days is this, and how many hours are left over?
A movie is 138 minutes long. Write this duration in hours and minutes.
A student spends 35 minutes on homework each day for 5 days. How many hours and minutes is this in total for the week?
Calculate the number of hours in one full week.
A project took 2.5 years to complete. How many months is that?
An online course has 20 modules, each lasting 30 minutes. What is the total duration of the course in hours?
A factory runs for 9 hours a day. How many minutes does it run in a 5-day week?
How many hours are there in the month of May?
Convert 400 hours into days and hours.
A task takes 2 hours, 5 minutes and 10 seconds. How many seconds is this in total?
If a month has 31 days, how many minutes does it have?
How many hours is 2.25 days?
A machine can produce an item in 120 seconds. How many items can it produce in one hour?
How many hours are there in 480 minutes?
Convert 4.75 hours into minutes.
A journey lasts 2 days and 10 hours. How many hours is this in total?
How many weeks are there in 70 days?
A runner completes a race in 190 minutes. How many hours and minutes is this?
Convert 15 weeks into hours.
An event lasted 800 minutes. How many hours and minutes is this?
How many years and months are there in 55 months?
Convert 2.5 minutes into seconds.
How many days are there in the last two months of the year?
What is 1 hour and 45 minutes in hours as a decimal?
A clock gains 5 seconds every hour. How many minutes fast will it be after 2 full days?
How many minutes are there in a non-leap year?
A space probe has been travelling for 200 days. How many full months is this? (Use an average of 30.4 days per month)
Convert 0.4 days into hours and minutes.
You have been alive for 500 weeks. How many years is this, approximately?
A clock is 20 minutes slow. If the actual time is 15:10, what time does the clock show in 12-hour pm format?
What fraction of a week is 42 hours?
A flight departs at 14:00. The flight time is 5 hours 30 minutes. The destination is 2 hours ahead of the departure city. What is the local arrival time?
A project takes 300 working hours. If a team of 4 people work on it, and each person works 5 hours a day, how many days will it take?
How many minutes are there in 15% of an hour?
A machine produces an item every 40 seconds. How many full items can it produce in one hour?
A clock is 15 minutes fast. It shows 1:05 pm. What is the true time?
Convert 10,000 hours into weeks, days, and hours.
A satellite orbits Earth in 1 hour and 35 minutes. How many full orbits does it make in a day?
How many seconds are in 1.15 hours?
A contract is for 1000 days. How many years, months, and days is this? (Use 1 year=365 days, 1 month=30 days)
A task takes 1 hour and 40 minutes. What percentage of a 4-hour period is this?
How many hours are in 30% of a week?
An event lasted for one million seconds. How many full days is this?
A car journey is 200 minutes. A train journey is 3.2 hours. Which is shorter and by how much?
Convert 100 days into months and days (use an average of 30.4 days/month).
A tap leaks 50ml per hour. How many litres does it leak in one year?
What is 100,000 minutes in weeks, days, hours, and minutes?
A person works 7.5 hours per day, 5 days a week for 48 weeks a year. How many minutes do they work per year?
How many seconds are there in the month of May?
Convert 150cm to metres.
A recipe needs 0.75kg of flour. What is this in grams?
A plank is 2.5m long. How long is it in millimetres?
A bucket holds 10 litres. How many cm³ is this?
A parcel weighs 1.25kg. If it costs £2 per kg, what is the total cost?
A pipe is 3.5m long. Another is 120cm long. What is their total length in metres?
A bottle holds 2 litres of juice. You pour out 750ml. How much is left in litres?
A delivery driver drives 800m. This is 1/5 of his total journey. How long is his total journey in km?
A baker uses 0.5kg of flour and 200g of sugar. What is the total weight in grams?
A piece of wood is 1.5m long. It is cut into 5 equal pieces. How long is each piece in cm?
How many 50ml doses can be taken from a 0.25 litre bottle of medicine?
A road is 5km long. After 1200m, how much further is there to go in metres?
A water filter cleans 1.2 litres per minute. How much water does it clean in 10 minutes, in ml?
A box contains 500g of biscuits. How many kilograms is this?
A liquid has a volume of 2.3 litres. It is then mixed with 800ml of another liquid. What is the total volume in litres?
A building is 55m tall. How tall is it in cm?
A path is 0.75km long. How many metres is this?
A fish tank holds 25 litres of water. It is filled using a 500ml jug. How many full jugs are needed?
A plank is 4.8m long. How long is it in mm?
A recipe calls for 1.2kg of sugar. You only have 800g. How much more sugar (in grams) do you need?
A running track is 400m long. How many kilometres is this?
A box of washing powder weighs 3.5kg. How much is left after 750g is used?
A car journey is 200km. If you have travelled 150,000m, how much further is there to go in metres?
A plant grows 0.5cm per day. How much does it grow in 10 days in mm?
A bottle of juice contains 0.33 litres. If I buy 5 bottles, how many ml do I have in total?
A bag of potatoes weighs 12.5kg. How much would 4 bags weigh in tonnes?
Convert 1.5kg to grams.
A bottle holds 2000ml of water. How many litres is this?
A plane ticket costs £450. A family buys 4 tickets. What is the total cost?
A company has a profit of £8000. It is shared equally between 4 partners. How much does each get?
